page.title: 18Uffington School Sports Day.
page.content: On June 18th we held our school sports.After unusually cold and wet weather we were fortunate in our choice.The school photographer was there to take photos of the 43 excited children who ran races according to their ages.They took part in running,sack,skipping with hoops, egg and spoon,3 Legged and bean bag races.There were also various house_ team relays.In the interval, ice cream and orange squash was served.The toddlers had their race and Mums and Dads joined in obstacle races.Girls and boys marathons ended the afternoon by which time most children had won several 1st,2nd or 3rd badges.The team points were added up_Lindsey won with 202 Kesteven had 97.Cups and medals were awarded to the children with the most number of points.
